column5: I was reading another post about a break-in in Niagara and it reminded me of today at work. Somebody put a poster on the toilet in the staff bathroom that said "IF YOU PEE ON THE SEAT, KARMA WILL GET YOU"  Well last night the night crew put a lifesize halloween mannequin behind the bathroom door with a sign around his neck that said KARMA  Man, it gave everyone a heart attack that used that bathroom.. myself included! LOL  Ahh... I need to fish.
That's funny.  Not as creepy as if the night crew guy was named Karma and was watching you  though.
